@sickedank wrote:

you started the number in which line the text would be on too low.

8144 is the title.

Then go on from there.

item.title: Need Coding Help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Goolo Pure Goolo
item.description:
@Pure_Goolo wrote:

Ok, This is the code I’m using…

[code]clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@red@-Owner-", 8135);
sendQuest("@whi@Owner Mike", 8136);
sendQuest("@red@-Admins-", 8137);
sendQuest("@whi@Spot Reserved", 8138);
sendQuest("@whi@Spot Reserved", 8139);
sendQuest("@whi@None", 8140);
sendQuest("@red@-Mods-", 8141);
sendQuest("@whi@None", 8142);
sendQuest("@whi@None", 8143);
sendQuest("@whi@None", 8144);
sendQuest("@red@-Rules-", 8145);
sendQuest("@whi@-Do not ask to be Mod or Admin", 8147);
sendQuest("@whi@-Do not Mass!", 8148);
sendQuest("@whi@-No Teaming when your Pking!", 8149);
sendQuest("@whi@-Respect all players at all times", 8150);
sendQuestSomething(8151);
showInterface(8152);
flushOutStream();

			}




public void ServerHelpMenu()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
			        sendQuest(" ", 8151);
			        sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@"+" ---", 8152);
			       	sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
	
			}[/code]

I basicly want the quest log to come up and say this…
-Owner-
Owner Mike
-Admins-
Spot Reserved
Spot Reserved
None
-Mods-
None
None
None
-Rules-
-Do not ask to be Mod or Admin
-Do not Mass!
-No Teaming when your Pking!
-Respect all players at all times

It only shows this when I log in

-Rules-
-Do not ask to be Mod or Admin
-Do not Mass!
-No Teaming when your Pking!
-Respect all players at all times

What do I do so It shows all of what I want it to show?

Read full topic
